relproducts.title: Roma Natural - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: This roma is natural by name, and natural by nature. This creamy off-white shade will allow plenty of light to penetrate through into the room, while still offering plenty of privacy when needed, meaning that you could have this blind closed all the time if need be. An excellent choice for rooms needing both privacy and light, such as a bathroom or bedroom, this shade will match pretty much any colour scheme.

relproducts.title: Thermatex Natural Vertical Blind
relproducts.description: This natural looking thermatex blind is perfect for adding colour into a room but keeping it beautifully neutral too. And as well as looking great, it works incredibly hard for you and your home. The thermatex fabric has a special coating that reflects up to 78% of the heat this natural looking thermatex blind is perfect for adding colour into a room but keeping it beautifully neutral too.

relproducts.title: Simplicity Linen Natural Vertical Blind
relproducts.description: Make your home feel extra homey with the simplicity linen natural vertical blind. Its warm, biscuit tones will make you want to snuggle down and relax. Thats not to say its not stylish too, it most certainly is. The flecked, linen-look design is easy to pair with lots of de make your home feel extra homey with the simplicity linen natural vertical blind.

relproducts.title: Roma Natural - Vertical Blind
relproducts.description: The roma in natural is just a whisper of a cream, with a finely woven fabric and a gentle, natural hue. An effective filter blind, this is the model of class, style, and neutrality. The natural will work as part of almost any colour scheme, being particularly suited to clean, fresh rooms full of soft pastels, such as pinks or blues - the perfect colour scheme for a nursery or child's bedroom. Or hang it in the living room amongst country greens and fresh, dainty florals, for a charmingly rustic feel with a contemporary twist.
